beego çš„ cache æ¨¡å—æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥åšæ•°æ®ç¼“å­˜çš„ï¼Œè®¾è®¡æ€è·¯æ¥è‡ªäº database/sqlï¼Œç›®å‰æ”¯æŒ fileã€memcacheã€memory å’Œ redis å››ç§å¼•æ“ï¼Œå®‰è£…æ–¹å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨bmå¢åˆ æ”¹ç¼“å­˜ï¼š

  • memory

    é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œé…ç½®çš„ä¿¡æ¯è¡¨ç¤º GC çš„æ—¶é—´ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ¯éš” 60s ä¼šè¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡è¿‡æœŸæ¸…ç†ï¼š

  • file

    é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œé…ç½® CachePath è¡¨ç¤ºç¼“å­˜çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•ï¼ŒFileSuffix è¡¨ç¤ºæ–‡ä»¶åç¼€ï¼ŒDirectoryLevel è¡¨ç¤ºç›®å½•å±‚çº§ï¼ŒEmbedExpiry è¡¨ç¤ºè¿‡æœŸè®¾ç½®

    {"CachePath":"./cache","FileSuffix":".cache","DirectoryLevel":"2","EmbedExpiry":"120"}

  • redis

    é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œredis é‡‡ç”¨äº†åº“ redigo:

    {"key":"collectionName","conn":":6039","dbNum":"0","password":"thePassWord"}
    • key: Redis collection çš„åç§°
    • conn: Redis è¿æ¥ä¿¡æ¯
    • dbNum: è¿æ¥ Redis æ—¶çš„ DB ç¼–å·. é»˜è®¤æ˜¯0.

  • memcache

    é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œmemcache é‡‡ç”¨äº† vitessçš„åº“ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤º memcache çš„è¿æ¥åœ°å€ï¼š

    {"conn":"127.0.0.1:11211"}

å¼€å‘è‡ªå·±çš„å¼•æ“

cache æ¨¡å—é‡‡ç”¨äº†æ¥å£çš„æ–¹å¼å®ç°ï¼Œå› æ­¤ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥å¾ˆæ–¹ä¾¿çš„å®ç°æ¥å£ï¼Œç„¶åæ³¨å†Œå°±å¯ä»¥å®ç°è‡ªå·±çš„ Cache å¼•æ“ï¼š

type Cache interface {
    // Get a cached value by key.
    Get(ctx context.Context, key string) (interface{}, error)
    // GetMulti is a batch version of Get.
    GetMulti(ctx context.Context, keys []string) ([]interface{}, error)
    // Set a cached value with key and expire time.
    Put(ctx context.Context, key string, val interface{}, timeout time.Duration) error
    // Delete cached value by key.
    Delete(ctx context.Context, key string) error
    // Increment a cached int value by key, as a counter.
    Incr(ctx context.Context, key string) error
    // Decrement a cached int value by key, as a counter.
    Decr(ctx context.Context, key string) error
    // Check if a cached value exists or not.
    IsExist(ctx context.Context, key string) (bool, error)
    // Clear all cache.
    ClearAll(ctx context.Context) error
    // Start gc routine based on config string settings.
    StartAndGC(config string) error
}

ç”¨æˆ·å¼€å‘å®Œæ¯•åœ¨æœ€åå†™ç±»ä¼¼è¿™æ ·çš„ï¼š

func init() {
    cache.Register("myowncache", NewOwnCache())
}
